Description: 14 beads of blue faience, slightly different shades of blue to green. Five different types: A: one big spherical bead. B: seven segmented-cylindrical beads of different diameters and lenghts. C: two single disc-shaped beads with sharp edges and three single disc-shaped beads with rounded edges.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
